Class MoveWithArrows

java.lang.Object
  MoveWithArrows

public class MoveWithArrows
extends java.lang.Object

MoveWithArrows moves an actor with the arrow keys. To use: -- Include class in your Greenfoot project /n -- At the beginning of your actor class type: MoveWithArrows mwa = new MoveWithArrows; -- In your act method type: MoveWithArrows.MoveWithArrows(this, Int speed);

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jim Stewart
